title.rendered: Rothenberger Day at the TTE Showroom

content.rendered:
This month, Rothenberger Day was organized at the TTE Products & Solutions showroom in Deira, Dubai. A wide range of innovative Rothenberger products were on display. Dr. Sabine Rothenberger, Chairman and Ole Held, Global Head of Sales along with their expert team, personally guided us through the latest product launches and their existing lineup.

As a manufacturer of pipe tools and machines, ROTHENBERGER has stood for quality and innovation for more than 70 years. The tools offer professional users efficient solutions for the highest demands and cover all HVAC, refrigeration and air-conditioning applications.
